of them can be solved with great context
engineering and great agentic prompt
engineering. But there is one massive
problem that persists no matter how
great your context engineering or
agentic prompt engineering becomes.
Traditional software improves as it's
used, storing user analytics, usage
data, and patterns that create
algorithms. Agents of today don't. The
massive problem with agents is this.
Your agents forget. And that means your
agents don't learn. There are a few
